capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and I'm quite certain about it. In fact, J.K. Rowling has explicitly stated that Hagrid is a man, so I don't think there's any room for doubt.

Hagrid, being a half-giant, is indeed a unique individual. I've always been fascinated by his kind heart and dedication to teaching Care of Magical Creatures at Hogwarts. He's definitely a beloved figure in the wizarding world, and his gentle giant persona has won over many hearts.
